Class NotificationObserver

java.lang.Object
observer.NotificationObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObserver
public class NotificationObserver extends Object implements IObserver
Implementation of the Observer pattern for managing notifications. The NotificationObserver class observes and handles notifications for a specific user.

    • notify

      public void notify(List<String> message)
      Adds a new notification message to the history.
      Specified by:

    • getNotificationHistory

      public List<List<String>> getNotificationHistory()
      Retrieves the notification history for the user.
      Specified by:
      getNotificationHistory in interface IObserver
      Returns:
      A list of lists, where each inner list represents a notification entry.

    • setNotificationHistory

      public void setNotificationHistory()
      Populates the notification history by fetching notifications from the NotificationController. Converts each notification into a formatted list of strings and adds it to the history.
      Specified by:
      setNotificationHistory in interface IObserver
